blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Show me a Hero
description:
by ViolentButterfly

Being a Hero is everything, but being Quirkless makes that almost impossible.

This is the sad truth, no one is created equal and Izuku learned that at the age of four. Despite all that he pushed forward, reaching for his Dream only for it to come crashing down around him during his pitiful attempt at the Hero entrance exam.

Sometimes, when one door closes, all you need to see is seek the opened window.

Besides, even Heroes need Heroes.

Words: 7188, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Shinsou Hitoshi, Bakugou Katsuki, Uraraka Ochako, Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Toga Himiko, A few random OC’s
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku/Shinsou Hitoshi, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, bakugo & camie, bakugo & ochaco
  • Additional Tags: Deku is NOT a Villain, Swearing, Quirkless Midoriya Izuku

blog.name: cheshire-hero
blog.title: Hero In Training: Cheshire
blog.description:
Recently graduated from college at an early age, 20 year old Mimora Yukina works as a sidekick to pro hero teachers at UA and a Teaching Assistant at UA. Her quirk is simply called Cat. She has almost all the abilities of a cat applied to human capabilities. including cat ears, tail and claws as sharp as swords. She's also super fast, super flexible, has ultrasonic hearing, can climb almost any surface and can jump incredible distances.
(Mun and Muse are both 18+ NSFW welcomed only after discussion between Muns. Absolutely will NOT ship with characters or muns that are minors!)

body:
Time for a headcanon!

Aizawa is a great dancer. Hardly anyone knows this except for a VERY few close people. His favorite (if he really has to dance for like an undercover mission or something) is the tango and he could easily steal the spotlight in any dance club if he ever felt like it. But he doesn’t really care for dancing and thinks clubs are a waste of time.

summary: What about autistic aizawa  ? I actually though of asperger first time i saw the anime / read the manga. He gets tired bc of...
question: What about autistic aizawa  ? I actually though of asperger first time i saw the anime / read the manga. He gets tired bc of social interraction and always wears the same comfy clothes. Plus quite ironically his quirk is linked to visual contact in a way
answer:
absolutely! i’d love to make a full fledged post out of this and the other asks in my inbox when i finally have time.

also this sleeping bag? definitely a comfort item
